articles.title: Why We're Still Playing Measles Whack-A-Mole? - Kashmir Times
articles.description: Why are we still playing whack-a-mole about measles, which is staging come back in India, UK and Americas when it can eliminated
articles.content:
By Shelly Bolotin, University of Toronto in Toronto
Measles is eliminated in some parts of the world, but its starting to make a comeback.

articles.title: 'There's only Plan A': Defense leaders fear failure in Ukraine - POLITICO
articles.description: Attendees of the Munich Security Conference were worried about Ukraine’s prospects against Russia and American commitment to Kyiv.
articles.content: Many politicians and officials used the moment to press that Ukraine would lose the war without the $60 billion more in U.S. military aid currently awaiting a vote in the House. But they also sounded… [+7598 chars]
